ComicInfo.Summary:
Lights... Camera... Vampire: A porn producer thinks he has discovered the next great star for the lead role of the vampire queen for his next film, "Blood Sucking Vampires in Heat". But when the film is developed, she is not visible in the scenes since she was a real vampire.
Friend or Foe: The Blood Hunter is after a vampire named Michael. Michael seeks refuge with Sara, who has used Michael's stories for her writing career. When Blood Hunter arrives, Michael reveals his true nature and turns on Sara, but Blood Hunter kills him.
Visitation: Michael was an angel assigned to be the guardian of Eleanor, but instead became her lover. He was cast out of heaven and lived out his life with Eleanor, but eventually she died. He took other human lovers, but outlived them as well. He has given up on love until a woman in a bar reveals that she cannot die because she is a vampire.
ComicInfo.Title: Lights... Camera... Vampire; Friend or Foe; Visitation
